scripts.compile: tsc --sourceMap --noImplicitAny -m commonjs --target ES5 firefox/**/*.ts firefox/**/**/*.ts server/index.ts
scripts.build: browserify firefox/data/metrics-integration/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny --sourceMap --target ES5 ] --debug -o firefox/data/metrics-integration/twitter-assistant-content.js --ignore WNdb --ignore lapack
scripts.watch: watchify firefox/data/metrics-integration/main.ts -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny --sourceMap --target ES5 ] --debug -o firefox/data/metrics-integration/twitter-assistant-content.js -v --ignore WNdb --ignore lapack
